title: EC to hold dialogue with political parties after Code of Conduct finalized
body: Senior Secretary of the Election Commission (EC) Akhtar Ahmed on Sunday said the commission will hold dialogue with the political parties after getting the final Code of Conduct 2025 for political parties and candidates ahead of the 13th Parliamentary Polls. “We’re waiting for the dialogue. We will fix the date for the talks after getting the gazette of the Code of Conduct for the candidates and political parties,” he said. He made the comments while replying to questions from journalists in front of his office at Nirbachan Bhaban in Agargaon, Dhaka. The EC had earlier held several rounds of talks with media personalities, election experts, women leaders, representatives from civil society and educationists ahead of the forthcoming parliamentary polls.
